save() - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.InputParser
Call the method that will save the summary of all the classifiers
saveClassifier() - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.ClassificationHandler
Save the summary of all the classifiers contained by the list classifiers (the first attribute) It save them in the path specified by the configuration file or in the fold .
ser() - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.InputParser
Call the metohd that will serialize all the classifiers
serialize() - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.ClassificationHandler
Serialize all the classifiers contained by the list classifiers (the first attribute) It save the serialized file in the path specified by the configuration file or in the fold .
serialize(String, Classifier) - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities.Serializer
Serialize the classifier and save it
Serializer - Class in it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities
This class fulfills all the responsibilities that concern the serialization and the deserialization of the classifiers.
